info.name: Tax Agile - sample collection - v1.2.0
info.description:
##### API Version: v1.2.0

This sample Postman collection is provided to help understand the Tax Agile API, it can be used in conjunction with our swagger OAS3 documentation [https://taxagile.github.io/developer-hub/](https://taxagile.github.io/developer-hub/API)

# Set up

You need to setup an Environment in Postman and it needs three fields:

## API_ROOT

This is the server hosting the API you want to make requests to, possible values are:

| **Server** | **API_ROOT** |
| --- | --- |
| Production | [https://api.taxagile.io](https://api.taxagile.io) |
| Staging | [https://test-api.taxagile.io/](https://test-api.taxagile.io/) |

## ACCOUNT_ID

This is your Tax Agile tenant on our platform, so this is not a username, but instead a identifier of your account as a whole.

We will provide you your Account Id and API key when you start to implement to our API.

_Note: these credentials will be provisioned against a server, so you must use Production credentials with the Production API_ROOT._

## API_KEY

This is a uuid string which will be provided by us when you start to implement to our API.

# Collection requests

In the collection root there are 12 example requests:

| **Name** | **Functionality** |
| --- | --- |
| **GET /health** | An unauthenticated endpoint, you can call to check you have the correct hostname and your firewall is letting you connect with Tax Agile. |
| **POST Auth** | Takes ACCOUNT_ID and API_KEY environment variables and creates a new Bearer token. |
| **POST VAT Determination - ICS** | Makes a VAT Determination which is not committed (saved) |
| **POST VAT Determination - Local supply** | Makes a VAT Determination which is not committed (saved) |
| **POST VAT Determination with commit** | Makes a VAT Determination with the commit=true parameter so save the transaction. |
| **GET VAT Determination by ID** | Returns a summary of the request sent and response given for the transaction; using the uuid returned on the commited determination as the ID. |
| **GET VAT Determinations for date range** | Queries the commited (saved) transactions and returns a paged result set. The example shows a date/time range filter, but other filter options are set on the request and can be enabled. |
| **POST Create Audit with json** | Create a new audit by sending in transactions in a JSON body |
| **POST Create Audit - Excel (form-data)** | Create a new audit by sending in transactions from an uploaded Excel sheet. |
| **GET Poll Operations endpoint** | Poll the operation for a complete status |
| **GET Audit summary by ID** | Fetch a summary of the audit job |
| **GET Audit results by ID** | Retrieve the detail of the audit |
| **GET Audits - list latest 100** | List top 100 audits in your account |
| **DELETE Audit by ID** | Delete an audit |

You can duplicate the sample requests and modify to fit your use-cases.

# Getting Started

When you have setup your environment, you should be able to use the "Auth" request without changing anything. If that doesn't work, then there is an issue with your setup; get in touch for help.

When you have successfully authenticated, the response contains a Bearer token and the Postman collection has some code in the requests to populate a local collection variable (AUTH_TOKEN) with that bearer token.

You can now try the "VAT Determination" endpoint; that automatically uses the Bearer token from your Auth request, so again it should work without changing anything.

query.description: Filter results by document number sent on the determination request
Filter results by VAT Code issued on the determination response
How many records to get in each response
Which page of resultset to return for this request

body.raw:
{
    "data": [
        {
            "seller": {
                "sellerUnionOssId": "",
                "euDistanceSellingThreshold": true,
                "sellerIossId": "",
                "establishedCountry": "BE",
                "isTravelAgent": false,
                "vatIdCountry": "BE",
                "registeredForDistanceSales": true,
                "type": "Taxable person",
                "countriesFixedEstablishment": "BE",
                "countriesVATRegistration": "BE",
                "name": "BE Company BVBA",
                "sellerNonUnionOssId": ""
            },
            "date": {
                "dateOfTransaction": "2022-10-15",
                "docDate": "2023-02-05",
                "supplyDate": "2023-02-05",
                "paymentDate": "2023-02-05"
            },
            "item": {
                "totalAmount": 1000,
                "itemType": "Other goods",
                "vatRateToCheck": 0,
                "description": "Book",
                "vatAmountToCheck": 0,
                "value": 1000
            },
            "thirdParties": {
                "mpEstablishedCountry": "",
                "mpRegisteredForIOSS": false,
                "mpRegisteredForOSS": false,
                "intermediaryRegisteredForIOSS": false,
                "carrierRegisteredForSpecialArrangements": false
            },
            "document": {
                "quantity": 1,
                "exchangeRate": "",
                "docNumber": "IN999",
                "docType": "Sales invoice",
                "currency": "EUR",
                "lineNumber": 1,
                "vatInclusiveOrExclusive":"VAT exclusive"
            },
            "locations": {
                "shipFrom": "BE",
                "departureCountry": "",
                "placeOfGoods": "DE",
                "placeOfService": "",
                "countryImport": "",
                "arrivalCountry": "",
                "shipTo": "DE"
            },
            "transportTerms": {
                "importerOfRecord": "",
                "transport": "Seller"
            },
            "transactionDetail": {
                "durationOfHire": "",
                "isCustomsProcedure": false,
                "importedUnderDefermentScheme": false,
                "isCustomsWarehouse": false,
                "isVatWarehouse": false,
                "soldOnMarketplace": false,
                "cashAccounting": false,
                "isExternalTransit": false,
                "isSuccessiveSupply": false,
                "callOffStock": false
            },
            "buyer": {
                "establishedCountry": "DE",
                "isAirline": false,
                "vatIdCountry": "DE",
                "type": "Taxable person",
                "countriesFixedEstablishment": "DE",
                "isVessel": false,
                "isCharity": false,
                "countriesVATRegistration": "DE",
                "name": "DE Company GmbH",
                "isHospital": false,
                "isGasElecTaxableDealer": false
            }
        }
    ],
    "options": {
        "sendToFiler": false,
        "doTaxCodeMapping": false
    }
}

request.description: For the form-data body, you may have trouble getting Postman to upload a file from your local machine. Check the settings: If you have it set like this, you must put your Excel files, in the named Location; or you can turn on "Allow reading files outside working directory" to be able to browse your computer for a file.

query.description: Number of transactions to return in response, max value 1000

The id of the transaction at the end of the previous results page. 
Don't send the param to get the first page

item.name: Audits - list latest 100 - most recent first
